What's the maximum time between vehicle inspections?

sections.name: Have you or anyone named in this application (including partners/directors and transport managers) been declared bankrupt or had their estate seized or confiscated?

Have you or anyone named in this application (including partners/directors and transport manager) been involved with a company, or business, that has gone into (or is going into) liquidation, owing money?
Have you or anyone named in this application (including partners/directors and transport managers) been involved with a company, or business, that has gone into (or is going into) receivership?
Have you or anyone named in this application (including partners/directors and transport managers) been involved with a company, or business, that has gone into (or is going into) administration?

Have you, or have any of your partners, directors, majority shareholders or your transport manager ever been disqualified from acting as a director of a company or from taking part in the management of a company?
Does anybody named in this application (including partners, directors and transport managers) currently hold a goods or public service vehicle operator's licence in any traffic area?
Has anybody named in the application (including partners, directors or transport managers) previously held or applied for a goods or public service vehicle operator's licence in any traffic area?

Has anybody named in this application (including partners, directors and transport managers) ever had an application for a goods or a public service vehicle operator's licence refused by any EU licensing authority?

Has anybody named in this application (including partners, directors and transport managers) ever had a goods or public service vehicle operator's licence revoked, suspended or curtailed by any EU licensing authority?
Has anybody named in this application (including partners, directors and transport managers) ever attended a public inquiry before a traffic commissioner?
Has anybody named in this application (including partners, directors and transport managers) ever been disqualified from holding or obtaining an operator's licence by any traffic commissioner?

Within the last 12 months, have you, your company or organisation or your partners or directors purchased the assets or shareholding of any company that, to your knowledge, currently holds or has previously held an operator's licence in any traffic area?

Has anybody named in this application, (including partners, directors and transport managers); any company of which anybody named on this application is or has been a director; any parent company if you're a limited company; or any of your employees or agents been convicted of any offence that must be declared to the traffic commissioner?
